meanings.definition: A device on a firearm used for aiming
meanings.sent1: The gunsights on the rifle helped the hunter aim at the deer.
meanings.sent2: He adjusted the gunsights on his pistol before the shooting competition.
meanings.sent3: The gunsights on the toy gun were so big, they looked comically oversized.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like gunsights, always focused and ready to hit the target.
meanings.sent5: The bright red gunsights made it easier to aim accurately in the dark.

meanings.definition: The act of aligning a firearm with a target
meanings.sent1: Using gunsights requires steady hands and good concentration.
meanings.sent2: His gunsights were perfectly aligned with the bullseye of the target.
meanings.sent3: During the competition, his gunsights seemed to have a mind of their own, always off target.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like the perfect gunsights, always focused on her goals.
meanings.sent5: The gunsights clicked into place, ready for the shooter to take aim.
